channel.title: [Need Help!] Chatting system
channel.description:
Hi im running a delta server [I know Delta sucks] I just on it with my mates...
Anyways I was wondering is the a way I can make a chatting system where you can speak like skype would the same way skype works like speak to eachother using head sets
if their is a code or file which I can add or implement or if anyone has any ideas or suggestions please leave your comments! =P

item.title: [Need Help!] Chatting system
item.dc:creator: @rhys132 rhys132
item.description:

Anyways I was wondering is the a way I can make a chatting system where you can speak like skype would
the same way skype works like speak to eachother using head sets

if their is a code or file which I can add or implement or if anyone has any ideas or suggestions
please leave your comments! =P[/quote]
you could code that but only if you have serious experience, and tbh if anyone has the code and spent like 2-3 months coding it they wont give it to you for free?

Read full topic
